entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 10 except 14 inland.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers beginning this evening and ending overnight. Amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023
